communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like documents pertaining to communication between the  Maui Emergency Management Agency and Samaritan's Purse between August 8, 2023 and December 1, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jonathan Michels

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Traffic Stop – Trenton Futrell

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: April 18, 2024
Suspect: Trenton Futrell
Incident Summary:
Futrell was pulled over for allegedly speeding 10 mph over the limit. After stopping in his driveway, he engaged in a profanity-laced tirade against the responding officer, refusing to provide his driver’s license and becoming increasingly aggressive. The officer called for backup, and after continued noncompliance, Futrell was arrested for resisting arrest. He was transported to jail and later released on bond.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:
Conducted the initial traffic stop.
Responded as backup to the scene.
Were involved in Futrell’s arrest and transport to jail.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – Shamesha Hendrix (Walmart, Muncie, IN)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: January 17
Location: Walmart, 1501 E 29th Street, Muncie, IN
Suspect: Shamesha Hendrix, 36
Victim: [Victim's name if available] and her infant child
Incident Summary:
Hendrix allegedly confronted the victim in the Walmart parking lot, insulted her child, and forcefully grabbed the baby seat from the shopping cart. She then allegedly threw the baby seat back into the cart, causing concern for the infant’s safety. Paramedics were called to check on the child. Hendrix fled the scene before officers arrived but was later arrested on February 15, 2024, and charged with battery of a person under the age of 14.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the Walmart incident on January 17
Interviewed the victim and any witnesses.
Reviewed security footage or assessed the infant’s condition.
Were involved in Hendrix’s arrest on February 15

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
